page.title: 13ST. BREWARD BAND
page.content: THE BAND WAS FORMED IN 1899 AND HAS BEEN ACTIVE EVER SINCE EXCEPT FOR THE WAR YEARS,1916 TO 1918 AND 1939 TO 1945. OVER THE YEARS THE BAND HAS PLAYED FOR ALL KINDS OF FUNCTIONS, FLORA DANCES, CARNIVALS, WEDDINGS, ETC (EVEN A FUNERAL) AND IN MANY DIFFERENT KINDS OF LOCATIONS ROUGHTOR, DOZEMARY POOL, AND OFTEN AT A NUMBER OF THE CORNISH BEACHES. NOW THERE ARE ABOUT 36 PLAYERS IN THE MAIN BAND AND A LEARNERS SECTION OF 12. THE BAND HAS ALWAYS BEEN A FAMILY TYPE GROUP WITH SONS FOLLOWING THEIR FATHERS AND FOREFATHERS, THIS NOW INCLUDES DAUGHTERS. THE BAND REGULARLY ATTENDS CONTESTS AND ALSO GIVES CONCERTS WHICH PROVIDES OPPORTUNITY FOR SOLOISTS TO SHOW OFF THEIR TALENTS.POPULAR MUSIC AND A GOOD CONTEST RECORD IS SECURING INTEREST IN THE BAND WHICH SEEMS ASSURED OF A GOOD FUTURE.
